author: cms-AlCaDB
body: This one-line PR fixes the crashes in workflows 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, as seen in PR #18753 . We tested and checked that this allows the workflows to run into completion, at the expense of making the AlCaReco and the eventSetupPathsKey having different names.
title: Update ALCARECOMuAlGlobalCosmics_cff.py
